summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3682 , for the improvement of Louisa Street from West Montlake Place to 24th Avenue North, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45351 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
